originalText.text: This company reached out to me regarding a trade show I was exhibiting at. They mislead me to think they were part of the trade organization, even referencing my booth number. They had all the info to mislead me to think they were affiliated with the Organization I was exhibiting at and are continuously trying to charge my account. They will trick you into reserving with them which saves you nothing by misleading you to prepay for reservation and never offering any option to cancel.

originalText.text: This business contacted our cllients in regard to a convention our company puts on each year.  The person our client spoke with misrepresented himself as a representative stating they had not registered to attend. I called Business  Travel expressing my concerns with their fraudulent representing my business and encouraged him to not do this again to no avail. We are  now reaching out to the NC Attorney General 'office. Dennis Parnell,  Executive Director,  NC Safety  Conference,  Inc.

originalText.text: The company misrepresented themselves.You have to sign a document and you CANNOT cancel your reservations. I have booked for many trade shows and have always been able to cancel. I would advise any company not to use Business Travel Bureau.  They are hard to work with and they do not offer the lowest prices.

originalText.text:
This business contacted me in regard to a convention I was attending.  The person I spoke with misrepresented himself as a representative of the host hotel.  He also stated there were no rooms available at this hotel.

Both these statements were proven to be untrue.

I cancelled the reservations and the business is now attempting to invoice me for a 25% cancellation fee.  I do not intend to pay it.

DO NOT RESPOND TO THIS COMPANY OR BOOK ROOMS WITH THEM.  THEY ARE NOT WHAT THEY REPRESENT THEMSELVES TO BE.
